body.p: Therefore, the full amount of impairment loss of CU150 for the unit is allocated to the goodwill. In accordance with paragraph C6 of Appendix C of IAS 36, if the partially‑owned subsidiary is itself a cash‑generating unit, the goodwill impairment loss is allocated to the controlling and non‑controlling interests on the same basis as that on which profit or loss is allocated.
